Configuration Message
format:
Next, confirm the configuration options below are correct for your coach.


Some options are only relevant to specific years (e.g. thermostats) or models (e.g. undercoach lights).

name: Welcome Message
format:
Welcome to CoachProxyOS!


Please select your year, model, and floor plan below to begin. You may need to scroll down in the menu to find your model or floor plan.

name: Save and Install Message
format:
When finished, use the "Save and Install" button below to save your changes and re-configure CoachProxyOS.


Important: Your web browser will disconnect momentarily while CoachProxyOS reloads. This re-configuration process will take approximately 30 seconds to complete.

name: Presets Instructions
format:
Select a preset number, enter a name, choose which devices to remember, and select "Save Preset".

Later, use the numbered preset buttons to restore your lights and/or thermostats to the saved values.

Note: Thermostat preset support (if available in your coach) is currently experimental.
